title: Lecture 1: Introduction

General Information

STAT 3000: Statistics with R Programming
Tentative Plan: Mondays: lectures; Wednesday: labs.

title: Lecture 1: Introduction

Course Description

title: Lecture 1: Introduction
section: To be successful in this course, you will
text:
To be successful in this course, you will

Pre-read each chapter before coming to each lecture
Attend each lecture
Review lecture notes after the lecture
Complete each ungraded lab solidly
Complete homework Assignments

title: Lecture 1: Introduction
text:
What’s coming

UNIX/Linux shell
Reproducible document preparation
R programming
Data wrangling with dplyr and data.table
Data visualization with ggplot2
Probability theory, inference and modeling
Regression Analysis with R
Intro to Machine Learning

title: Lecture 1: Introduction
text:
Let’s get started

Install R.
Install RStudio.
